exceptions.exn: In environment u : nat -> Rbar l : Rbar Hl : is_sup_seq u l Unable to unify "is_sup_seq u l" with "match Sup_seq u with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, (forall n : nat, Rbar_lt (u n) (l + eps)) /\\ (exists n : nat, Rbar_lt (l - eps) (u n)) | p_infty => forall M : R, exists n : nat, Rbar_lt M (u n) | m_infty => forall (M : R) (n : nat), Rbar_lt (u n) M end".

original: unfold is_sup_seq. destruct (ex_sup_seq u) as [l Hl]. apply Hl.
